versos: (glorify) John 17:4 - "I have glorified You on the earth. I have finished the work which You have given Me to do.";;;
(founded) Psalm 24:2 - "For he founded it upon the seas and established it upon the waters.";;;
(aha) Psalm 40:15 - "May those who say to me, 'aha aha' be appalled at their own shame.";;;
(ah) Psalm 5:1 - "Give ear to my words, O Lord, consider my meditation.";;;
(deviseth) Proverbs 16:30 - "He shutteth his eyes to devise froward things: moving his lips he bringeth evil to pass.";;;

(lovers) Song of Solomon 7:12 - "Let us go early to the vineyards to see if the vines have budded, if their blossoms have opened, and if the pomegranates are in bloom there I will give you my love.";;;
(raiment) Matthew 6:28 - "And why take ye thought for raiment Consider the lilies of the field, how they grow; they toil not, neither do they spin";;;

(baanah) 2 Samuel 20:1 - Now a troublemaker named Sheba son of Bicri, a Benjamite, happened to be there. He sounded the trumpet and shouted, "We have no share in David, no part in Jesse's son Every man to his tent, Israel";;;
(unjust) Isaiah 10:1 - "Woe to those who make unjust laws, to those who issue oppressive decrees,";;;
(meekness) Matthew 5:5 - "Blessed are the meek, for they will inherit the earth.";;;
(swelling) Ezekiel 47:6 - "He asked me, Son of man, do you see this Then he led me back to the bank of the river. When I arrived there, I saw a great number of trees on each side of the river.";;;
(sunder) "Let them be as chaff before the wind, and let the angel of the Lord chase them. Let their way be dark and slippery: and let the angel of the Lord persecute them." - Psalm 35:5-6;;;
(brutish) Psalm 94:8 - "Understand, ye brutish among the people: and ye fools, when will ye be wise";;;
(partaker) Hebrews 3:14 - "For we have become partakers of Christ if we hold the beginning of our confidence steadfast to the end,";;;

(judgest) 1 Corinthians 4:5 - "Therefore judge nothing before the appointed time; wait until the Lord comes. He will bring to light what is hidden in darkness and will expose the motives of the heart. At that time each will receive their praise from God.";;;
(create) Genesis 1:1 - "In the beginning God created the heavens and the earth.";;;
(uphold) Isaiah 41:10 - "So do not fear, for I am with you; do not be dismayed, for I am your God. I will strengthen you and help you; I will uphold you with my righteous right hand.";;;
